wishText: Mai itna lucky hoon to have you by my side (but 40 km dooor ðŸ˜ƒ). I wish ki saath hote , but theeke bohot birthdayss aayenage.
textInChatBox: Maine socha tha ki mast saath rahengae , celebrate karengae, wanted to make you feel special more than anyone .
text2: But hum saath ho ya na ho i should be able to always make you feel special
outroText: Accha now you can call me and tell me ,  how much you love me
replayText: Ya click idhar, wapas se dhekne ke liye
